attributes.action: ensure that Calderdale Council listens to local residents when planning the Trinity Academy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Calderdale Council plan to move a restricted public bypass from it's current location.  Unfortunately the proposed new location effects a large number of residents living in the local community in a variety of ways.

We would like to ensure that any new location is planned with local residents, to try and find a suitable location with minimal impact on local residents and/or their properties.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
